str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
Bitter, acrid, malignant. Perhaps from pegnumi; sharp, i.e. Acrid.
From zeo; properly, heat, i.e. 'zeal' (figuratively, of God), or an enemy, malice).
Perhaps as the same as erethizo; properly, intrigue, i.e. faction.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To boast against, exult over. From kata and kauchaomai; to exult against.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To deceive, lie, speak falsely. Middle voice of an apparently primary verb; to utter an untruth or attempt to deceive by falsehood.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
